column1: Smoque BBQ////After seeing it on DDD
column2: Smoque was one of the first places I went to after moving to Chicago a few years ago.  I was not disappointed!  Smoque has the best BBQ I have had in Chicago
column3: and probably the best brisket I have ever had.  The sliced brisket with BBQ beans and mac and cheese makes an amazing meal.  Both kinds of ribs are also amazing
column4: and the dark horse on the menu is the smoked chicken.  It is amazing.  The best part of Smoque's menu is the "add a taste" section where you can add a small portion of many of their meats to your meal.  It is a great way to try many different things.  All of the sides are incredible.
